TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripProgressBar extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost

summary.span: 表示 中所包含的 Windows 進度列控制項。

span.span: Represents a Windows progress bar control contained in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是適合裝載在。 is the optimized for hosting in a . 裝載的控制項的屬性和事件的子集會公開在層級，但基礎控制項是完全可透過存取屬性。A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the level, but the underlying control is fully accessible through the property. A控制項以視覺效果指示長時間作業的進度。A control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation. 控制項會顯示狀態列，它會從左到右的系統醒目提示色彩隨著作業的進度會填入。The control displays a bar that fills in from left to right with the system highlight color as an operation progresses. > [!NOTE] > 控制項只能導向水平。The control can only be oriented horizontally. 控制項通常用於應用程式在執行工作，例如將檔案複製或列印文件。The control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents. 應用程式的使用者可能會考慮應用程式沒有回應，如果沒有視覺提示。Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue. 使用來通知使用者應用程式正在執行長時間工作和應用程式是否仍有回應。Use the to notify the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding. 和屬性會定義範圍的值代表工作的進度。The and properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task. 屬性通常會設定為值為零，而屬性通常設定為值，表示工作完成。The property is typically set to a value of zero, and the property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task. 例如，若要複製的檔案群組時，正確顯示進度屬性無法複製設定為的檔案總數。For example, to display the progress properly when copying a group of files, the property could be set to the total number of files to be copied. 屬性表示應用程式已完成此作業的進度。The property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation. 因為控制項中顯示的列區塊的集合，這個值會顯示由只近似屬性的目前值。Because the bar displayed in the control is a collection of blocks, the value displayed by the only approximates the property's current value. 根據大小、屬性會決定何時顯示下一個區塊。Based on the size of the , the property determines when to display the next block. 有數種方式來修改顯示的值以外變更直接屬性。There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the other than changing the property directly. 您可以使用屬性來指定要遞增的特定值屬性，然後再呼叫方法，以遞增的值。You can use the property to specify a specific value to increment the property by, and then call the method to increment the value. 若要變化的遞增值，您可以使用方法，並指定值的遞增屬性。To vary the increment value, you can use the method and specify a value by which to increment the property. 會取代舊版控制項，不過會保留回溯相容性。 replaces the older control, which is nevertheless retained for backward compatibility. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範計算 Fibonacci 數字的序列。The following code example demonstrates a that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.

summary.span: 以指定的數量來前移進度列的目前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您根據特定的數量遞增進度列的值。The method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount. 這個方法是會遞增進度列，類似於使用屬性方法。This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the property with the method. 屬性會指定目前的位置。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果在呼叫方法，屬性的值大於屬性，屬性的值會保持屬性。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果在呼叫含有負值中指定的方法`value`參數，屬性小於的值屬性，屬性保持在值屬性。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MarqueeAnimationSpeed { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示每一次 顯示更新之間的延遲時間 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value representing the delay between each display update, in milliseconds.

value.span: 表示延遲時間的整數 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: An integer representing the delay, in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得或設定顯示更新的延遲。The property gets or sets the delay of display update. 因此，當您減少的值屬性，此動畫會增加的速度。Therefore, as you decrease the value of the property, the speed of the animation increases.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Maximum { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定為此 所定義的範圍上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the upper bound of the range that is defined for this .
An integer representing the upper bound of the range.
The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性指定的上限屬性。This property specifies the upper limit of the property. 當值屬性變更，以反映新的控制項範圍重繪控制項時。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 當值屬性的值等於完全填滿屬性，進度列。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is completely filled. 您可以使用這個屬性指定的值，屬性必須設定為 (藉由設定屬性，或使用或方法) 來表示作業已完成。You can use this property to specify a value that the property must be set to (by setting the property or using the or methods) to indicate that an operation is complete. 例如，您可以設定的值檔案複製作業中的檔案總數的屬性。For example, you can set the value of the property to the total number of files in a file copy operation. 複製檔案時，每次屬性可以增加 1 之前複製的檔案總數。Each time a file is copied, the property can be increased by one until the total number of files is copied. 此時，會完全填入進度列。At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性計算 Fibonacci 數字的序列。The following code example demonstrates a use of the property in a that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers. 這個程式碼範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example that provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets or sets the lower bound of the range that is defined for this .
An integer representing the lower bound of the range.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性指定的下限屬性。This property specifies the lower limit of the property. 當值屬性變更，以反映新的控制項範圍重繪控制項時。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 當值屬性的值等於屬性，進度列是空的。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is empty. 若要變更進度列的值，請使用屬性方法，請使用方法，或設定值直接屬性。To change the value of the progress bar, use the property with the method, use the method, or set the value of the property directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性計算 Fibonacci 數字的序列。The following code example demonstrates a use of the property in a that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers. 這個程式碼範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example that provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PerformStep() cil managed

summary.span: 根據 屬性所設定的量，在進度列上從目前位置前進到下一個位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法遞增進度列的值所指定的數量屬性。The method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the property. 您可以使用屬性來指定在作業中每個已完成的工作進度列的值變更的數量。You can use the property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar. 比方說，如果您要複製的檔案群組中，您可能想要設定的值1 的值屬性屬性来複製的檔案總數。For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the property to 1 and the value of the property to the total number of files to copy. 每個檔案複製時，您可以呼叫方法來遞增進度列的值來屬性。When each file is copied, you can call the method to increment the progress bar by the value of the property. 如果您想要擁有更有彈性之值的進度列控制項，您可以使用方法設定的值或直接屬性。If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the method or set the value of the property directly. 屬性會指定目前的位置。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果在呼叫方法，屬性的值大於屬性，屬性的值會保持屬性。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果在呼叫含有負值中指定的方法`value`參數，屬性小於的值屬性，屬性保持在值屬性。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出當 屬性設定為 時， 配置為右到左還是左到右。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the layout is right-to-left or left-to-right when the property is set to .

value.span: 表示當 屬性設定為 時，要啟用左右反轉，並將控制項配置為從右到左的方向，否則為 。

span.span: to turn on mirroring and lay out control from right to left when the property is set to ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制由右至左撰寫該語言的國際應用程式的配置。Use the property to control the layout of international applications in which the language is written from right to left. 當屬性是`true`，而屬性設定為，鏡像就會啟用，Windows 表單和控制項的位置上，而且文字會由右至左。When the property is `true`, and the property is set to , mirroring will be enabled on the Windows form and control placement and text will be from right to left.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RightToLeftLayoutChanged As EventHandler

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ToolStripProgressBar1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripProgressBar1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
